page.title: 16Three Playground Games 2
page.content: When they sing this song queenio coco turns round and when they finish the song she tries to guess who has the ball.If she guesses correctly she may be queenio coco again if she guesses incorrectly the person who really has the ball is queenio coco. Hide and seek is a game where you need three or more people.One person is on.They have to count to one hundred the other people have to hide. When the person who is on has finished counting he goes to look for the other people who are hiding.The first person who he finds is on next.
